name: Importance of Medical Knowledge
author: Dr. Monirul Fahad
blog: Medical Knowledge includes an understanding of all established and evolving biomedical, clinical, epidemiological, and social-behavioral sciences. They must also demonstrate the ability to apply it to patient care and appropriately and enthusiastically transfer that knowledge to others

name: Surgery and Surgent
author: Dr. Anusha Islam
blog: Surgery is a medical or dental specialty that uses operative manual and instrumental techniques on a person to investigate or treat a pathological condition such as a disease or injury, to help improve bodily function, appearance, or to repair unwanted ruptured areas.

name: Healthy Life
author: Dr. Anika Islam
blog: There are tons of healthy living blogs and resources online that it can feel overwhelming — with so many to choose from, how do you know which you should really pay attention to? Here’s a place to start: our favorite health blogs that help empower people to find customized

name: Technology in Medical
author: Dr. Rafiq Ahsan
blog: By using technology, the medical field can make discoveries regarding treatments, data collection, symptom and disease research, cure research, human aiding devices (like hearing devices and speaking devices). Technology has made the medical area very accessible to people.with so many to choose from you should really pay attention to
